metadata.synopsis: The Titan's combat ADs during the Foundry boss fight. He's the ultmate watcher. Tagging with SFX in case anything special could be added to his voice to make him sound extra scary and mechanical.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -1970; -7; 206open the door in front of you and enter the roomstart the fight with the watchers and observe the ADs from the Titan watcher

0.speaker: Steel Watcher Titan
0.text: You are the architect of your own demise.

1.speaker: Steel Watcher Titan
1.text: The Steel Watch will be in every city, on every street in the Forgotten Realms. It is inevitable.

2.speaker: Steel Watcher Titan
2.text: The Steel Watch is progress. It is the future - you cannot stop it.

3.speaker: Steel Watcher Titan
3.text: Resistance is futile. Your death is inevitable.
